description:
Tiny utility to change monitor brightness via DDC/CI. It supports multi-monitor setup and hotkeys.

### Main features
- Popup with monitor selector and brightness slider
- Hotkeys
- Supports Windows 7/8/8.1/10
- Fluent design with blur
	
### Package Parameters
- `/NoDesktopIcon` — do not create desktop icon
- `/NoStartMenuIcon` — do not create icon in start menu
summary: Tiny utility to change monitor brightness via DDC/CI.
